page.title: 08Hatton 1
page.content: Mr. Hugh Stewart is the farmer.His farm is closest to the school and is beside the ruin of{Hatton Castle.}We know it is old because{Robert the {Bruce}signed a charter about 1320 at the " Haltoun of Newtyld". The present castle was built in 1575. The farm has crops and animals. Most of the cattle,ewes and lambs are grazed on the hill ground during the summer months.Mr.Jim Finlay,who used to farm the Hatton,{reclaimed}the Hatton Hill from the wild about 15 years ago.It used to have heather on it but now it has good grass. Mr.Stewart buys and sells cattle and sheep at Perth market.For cattle breeding he has two{ Simmental bulls. He keeps his animal inside from December until March. Jane Steel Primary 7.
